name: Arctic Truck Parking Simulator
description:
In this realistic parking simulation game, your objective is simple .... drive your big arctic snow truck through a variety of obstacles and get to the parking spot!

Be careful, this may sound easy, but you will quickly find out its not! How many levels can you complete?

FEATURES

- Realistic 3D graphics.
- 10 challenging levels to complete.
- Multiple camera views.
- Real winter snow and ice physics!
